model.scene1_body: It was the Annual Haircut Day for Sringeri Srinivas.
model.scene2_body: Sringeri Srinivas left home as usual to go to the local barber.
model.scene3_body: But the barber said, "Today, I have no time to cut such long hair!"
model.scene4_body: Feeling sad, Sringeri Srinivas went back home to ask his wife for help.
model.scene5_body: But his wife said, "Today, I have no time to cut such long hair!"
model.scene6_body: Feeling a little angry, Sringeri Srinivas went to his friend, the tailor.
model.scene7_body: But the tailor said, "Today, I have no time to cut such long hair!"
model.scene8_body: Now a little worried, Sringeri Srinivas went to one more friend, the carpenter.
model.scene9_body: But the carpenter said, "Today, I have no time to cut such long hair!"
model.scene10_body: Poor Sringeri Srinivas. It seemed no one would cut his hair on this Annual Haircut Day.
model.scene11_body: In tears, he walked off by himself past the village forest.
model.scene12_body: He sat near a cave and cried loudly.
model.scene13_body: "The day is nearly over. How can I keep my promise to cut my hair? Oh God, help me!"
model.scene14_body: The tiger sleeping peacefully inside the cave was very disturbed by all the noise.
model.scene15_body: He came out, roaring, waving his giant paws at Sringeri Srinivas.
model.scene16_body: Poor Sringeri Srinivas was so scared, so scared, so scared that ...
model.scene17_body: ... all the hair fell off his head!
model.scene18_body: Sringeri Srinivas ran all the way back to the village. The tiger went back to sleep.
model.scene19_body: Now, Sringeri Srinivas will not need a haircut for a very long time.
model.scene22_body: Match the tools to the people.
model.scene23_body: Take me home. Take each person to their home.
model.kettle_usage: Kettle is used for boiling tea.
model.scene20_hint: Barber has Scissors to Cut hair.
model.scene21_hint: Carpenter has a hammer and nail.
model.scene22_hint: Carpenter uses this to cut wood.
model.scene23_hint: The tailor is surrounded by clothers to stitch.
